label: cascading_failure_01_dx_dns_migration_002
content:
## 2026-01-04 Daily Operations Summary

### Endpoint Performance
- /dns-query: REQUESTS 19200 req | p50: 17.4ms p95: 41.9ms p99: N/A | err: 1.9% (366 errors) | success: 98.1%
- /zone-transfer: REQUESTS N/A req | p50: N/Ams p95: N/Ams p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A%
- /dnssec-sign: REQUESTS N/A req | p50: N/Ams p95: N/Ams p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A%
- /health-check: REQUESTS N/A req | p50: N/Ams p95: N/Ams p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A%
- /change-request: REQUESTS 4 req | p50: N/Ams p95: N/Ams p99: N/A | err: 0% (0 errors) | success: 100%
- /cache-status: REQUESTS N/A req | p50: N/Ams p95: N/Ams p99: N/A | err: N/A | success: N/A%

### Infrastructure
- bind-master-01: CPU 31% | Mem 60% | Disk 71% | Conns: 1210 | Net: 78/104 Mbps
- bind-slave-02: CPU 26% | Mem 50% | Disk 54% | Conns: 1020 | Net: 64/82 Mbps
- cloud-dns-sync-01: CPU 49% | Mem 64% | Disk 46% | Conns: N/A | Net: 88/120 Mbps
- signer-01: CPU 36% | Mem 69% | Disk 58% | Conns: N/A | Net: 16/18 Mbps

### Connection Pools
- pool-axfr: active 36 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 50 | avg_wait 0ms
- pool-ixfr: active 210 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 250 | avg_wait 0ms
- pool-signing: active 1 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 2 | avg_wait 0ms
- pool-cloud-sync: active 4 | idle 0 | waiting 0 | exhaustion 0 | max 10 | avg_wait 0ms

### CDN & Caching
- Hit rate: 88.1% | Bandwidth: 1.2 Gbps | Origin requests: 1500

### Alerts
- [INFO] DNSSEC bogus validation event on signer-01: 1 event
- [WARNING] N/A
- [CRITICAL] N/A

### Deployments & Changes
- Completed delegation review for pilot zones; removed one stale NS entry left in registrar configuration.
- Ran dry-run of bulk record import for 20 additional zones; validation flagged 3 CNAME-at-apex issues; corrected templates.
- Scheduled DNSSEC ZSK rotation window; verified DS records remain consistent and monitored bogus validation events (none material).

### Events
- Completed delegation review for pilot zones; removed one stale NS entry left in registrar configuration.
- Ran dry-run of bulk record import for 20 additional zones; validation flagged 3 CNAME-at-apex issues; corrected templates.
- Observed minor increase in NXDOMAIN due to decommissioned legacy hostnames; added temporary wildcard record in staging only for testing, not promoted.
- Scheduled DNSSEC ZSK rotation window; verified DS records remain consistent and monitored bogus validation events (none material).

### On-Call
- shift handoff note: Shift: L. Nguyen. 1 pages. 5 tickets. Status: Normal; proceeding with staged expansion after template fixes.
